name: Akim Boyko
body:
# Summary
## Programming languages
C#, C++, PowerShell, SQL
## Platforms
Microsoft Windows Servers and Workstations, and also Linux and UNIX
## Specialties
* Web applications: ASP.NET MVC, ORM
* Parallel, concurrent and asynchronous data processing
* Unit and integration testing, continuous integration

# Community and Open Source contribution
* [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/users/443366/akim) and [Programmers.StackExchange](http://programmers.stackexchange.com/users/49383/akim)
* [Aspect-Oriented Programming by examples for #KievAltNet](http://akimboyko.github.com/presentations/aop-by-examples.html#/title)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/akimboyko/)
* [GistHub snippets](https://gist.github.com/akimboyko)

# Professional Experience
Web applications, Internet search, image processing and a lot more since 2002...
* Itera Consulting, Kiev, Ukraine. _Third time I'm participating in good development team, this time I had built it from scratch_
    * Dec 2011-… — Lønnsforhandling Modul: web application for salary negotiations between Norwegian employers and labor unions
    * Apr 2011-Nov 2011 — Snowball: social media viral advertisement framework with Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Foursquare integration
    * Feb 2009-Feb 2011 — involvement in different nearshoring projects
* Luxoft, Kiev, Ukraine. _I really proud of myself that I been member of those two teams, with them I had practical experience of what is Scrum done right._
    * Sep 2007-Dec 2008 — ProQuo: junk mail subscription/unsubscription web based application
    * Nov 2006-Aug 2007 — Scoop: social oriented Internet search
* Miratech, Kiev, Ukraine
    * Sep 2005-Sep 2006 — outsourcing as is, but I meet great people while was working there
* DevZeroG, Kiev, Ukraine
    * Nov 2003-Aug 2005 — product company, first experience with eXtreme Programming
* May 2002-Set 2003 — Work at several small companies while studying

# Education
National Technical University of Ukraine 'Kyiv Polytechnic Institute' — masters degree, Computer-aided Design Systems

# Interests
I have computer since 5 y.o., thus both my work and my hobby somehow connected with computers.
Actively participate at [Manning Early Access Program](http://www.manning.com/about/meap.html) the most sensitive, final piece of the publishing cycle by offering feedback to the author.

# Contacts
* [Twitter @AkimBoyko](https://twitter.com/AkimBoyko)
* [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/aboyko)
